ComicInfo.Title: Bad Blood Part One
ComicInfo.Summary: Avengelyne is thrust into the sordid nightlife of Miami, as she is assaulted by powerful opponents, vampires! For those addicted to blood, nothing sounds sweeter than the purity of the Earth-fallen angel's warm nectar of life. Blood so pure can be corrupted, tainted, and turned to a powerful force for the mysterious dark legions, a bad blood with the strength of the gods!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-08 10:52:52. [CVDB118938]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Al Rio, David Hahn, Jeff Austin, Matt Haley, Nimbus Studios, Sean Shaw, Terry Staats, Tim Vigil
ComicInfo.Characters: Anna Martelli, Avengelyne, Glyph, Ravyn, Tanya Nichols
